title: 哪个爱玩minecraft.
author: torch.sun
txt_content:
MC我玩了1年了。我很爱玩minecraft.我的steve。
不知道大家爱minecraft不？
我的损友
[diamond_ore][coal_ore][iron_ore][gold_ore][redstone_ore][lapis_lazuli_ore][coal][iron_ingot][gold_ingot][diamond_gem][redstone_dust][diamond_block][gold_block][iron_block]我爱的
[lava][monster_spawner]我不爱的
[diamond_helmet][diamond_chestplate][diamond_leggings][diamond_boots][diamond_sword][diamond_pickaxe][diamond_hoe][diamond_shovel][diamond_axe]diamond[diamond_gem][diamond_gem][diamond_gem]

replies.author: Sky、果冻
replies.txt_content: 不爱为什么要来这个论坛

replies.txt_content:
of course
   ——你很有想法，跟我学做菜吧

replies.author: Skyit
replies.txt_content: 不爱就不会玩mc就不会来mcbbs这样一来LZ你的贴就是名副其实的水贴了
在论坛发这样的帖子，你很有想法 ，和我学做菜吧
爱玩就去买正版！支持minecraft支持mojang吧
